falsificationAttempts.targetDescription: True provider-side batching is required to scale.
falsificationQueries: Can batching be simulated without provider-side support?
falsificationAttempts.falsificationAnalysis: Blueprint-batching notes OpenRouter lacks batch endpoints and suggests simulated batching. This weakens the claim that provider-side batching alone is the scaling solution; request-led queuing still provides auditability but may not deliver full throughput gains without direct provider batch APIs.
